name: [#PROTOSHI] 5 Second Survivor (Week 1)
description:
You have been infected! 

You have 5 seconds left to live you know you can stave off the infection but for how long?

5 Second Survivor is a prototype entry for Week 1 of the Protoshi Game Jam

Objective:

Collect serum to try resist the infection and try take as many of those zombies with you before you go.

Killing a Zombie will get you 5 seconds extra life from determination.

Getting bit by a Zombie will lose you 10 seconds of life.

There are ammo pickups lying around the map to give you 5 ammo each.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Shoot

Q - Switch Control mode
